name: Oboz Sypes Mid Leather B-Dry Hiking Shoes - Women's
categories: Sypes Mid Leather B-Dry Hiking Shoes
description:
Stay grounded on your way to your favorite lookout. These supportive, mid-height hiking boots are made with sustainable elements, so you feel good about each step, inside and out.Nubuck leather and abrasion-resistant Cordura® Aft mesh upper with TPU overlays.Oboz BDry waterproof-breathable membrane keeps rain out and lets sweat escape.Laces and webbing are made from Repreve® recycled bottles.O-Fit insole with Bloom™ foam made from algae biomass.Lightweight polyurethane midsole with adaptive cushioning and a nylon shank for stability.Bend outsole provides support and traction on the trail.

        Sustainability
